name: ladylike
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
graceful, polite, and behaving in a way that is thought to be socially acceptable for a woman: Well, it might not be ladylike but I'm going to pull my skirt up to get over this fence. Opposite
unladylike
Add to word list
Add to word list
suitable for a lady: There are some things I won’t talk about because it’s not ladylike.
